Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bluegreen Vacations Club La Pension,Ascend Resort Collection, you'll be centrally located in New Orleans, steps from Audubon Insectarium and The Shops at Canal Place. This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Cigar Factory New Orleans and Museum and Battle of Liberty Place Monument.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

With a stay at Bluegreen Vacations Club La Pension,Ascend Resort Collection, you'll be centrally located in New Orleans, steps from Audubon Insectarium and The Shops at Canal Place. This family-friendly condominium resort is within close proximity of Cigar Factory New Orleans and Museum and Battle of Liberty Place Monument.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Audubon Insectarium - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
The Shops at Canal Place - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Cigar Factory New Orleans and Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Battle of Liberty Place Monument - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve Visitor Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Woldenberg Park - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
New Orleans Musical Legends Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Audubon Aquarium of the Americas - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
New Orleans Pharmacy Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Historic New Orleans Collection - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Steamboat Natchez Dock - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Spanish Plaza - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
The Shops at JAX Brewery - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Henry Clay Statue - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
McDonogh Monument - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
New Orleans, LA (NEW-Lakefront) - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
New Orleans, LA (MSY-Louis Armstrong New Orleans Intl.) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi

The preferred airport for Bluegreen Vacations Club La Pension,Ascend Resort Collection is New Orleans, LA (MSY-Louis Armstrong New Orleans Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
